faq.intro_description: Here are some commonly asked questions about dysgraphia support and our platform.
faq.answer_what_is_dysgraphia: Dysgraphia is a neurological condition that affects writing abilities. It manifests as difficulty with handwriting, spelling, organizing thoughts on paper, and maintaining proper spacing and letter formation.
faq.answer_causes: Dysgraphia is a neurological condition, not a result of lack of effort or intelligence. It's often inherited and relates to how the brain processes motor skills and language.
faq.question_symptoms: What are the signs of dysgraphia?
faq.answer_symptoms: Common signs include: illegible handwriting, inconsistent spacing, difficulty spelling, slow writing speed, difficulty organizing thoughts, trouble with grammar, and reluctance to write.
faq.question_age: At what age can dysgraphia be identified?
faq.answer_age: Dysgraphia can often be identified in children as young as 5-7 years old when writing instruction begins, though formal diagnosis is typically made around age 8-9.
faq.answer_treatment: While dysgraphia cannot be cured, children can make significant progress with proper intervention, therapy, and support. Many individuals learn strategies to manage and overcome their challenges.
faq.question_specialist: How do I find the right specialist?
faq.answer_specialist: Browse our specialist directory, filter by location and experience, read reviews from other families, and use our booking system to schedule a consultation.
faq.answer_consultation: During an initial consultation, the specialist will assess your child's writing abilities, discuss challenges and concerns, and develop a personalized treatment plan.
faq.answer_cost: Consultation fees vary by specialist and are clearly displayed in their profile. Check with your insurance provider about potential coverage.
faq.question_location: Do you have specialists in my area?
faq.answer_location: We have specialists in all 58 provinces of Algeria. Use our location filter to find specialists near you.
faq.question_appointment: How do I book an appointment?
faq.answer_appointment: Simply browse specialists, click 'Book Appointment', select your preferred date and time, add any notes, and confirm your booking.
faq.answer_reschedule: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel appointments from your dashboard at least 24 hours before the scheduled time.
faq.answer_platform: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and security measures to protect your personal and medical information.
faq.answer_privacy: We comply with data protection regulations and never share your information with third parties without your consent.
faq.question_account: How do I create an account?
faq.answer_account: Click on 'Sign Up', enter your email, create a password, and fill in your profile information. You'll receive a verification email to confirm your account.
faq.answer_multiple_children: Yes, you can add multiple children to your account and manage their appointments and information separately.
faq.answer_support: Use our contact form, email support, or call our helpline. Our team responds within 24 hours.
faq.question_specialist_qualifications: What qualifications do your specialists have?
faq.answer_specialist_qualifications: All specialists on our platform are licensed professionals with specialized training in dysgraphia therapy and support.
faq.answer_feedback: Yes, after each appointment, you can rate your experience and provide feedback to help us improve our service.
faq.contact_support: Still have questions? Contact our support team
about.page_description: Learn about our mission and vision

about.vision_description: A future where every child with dysgraphia receives the professional support they need to overcome writing challenges and succeed academically.
about.value_1_description: We maintain the highest standards of professional care and support.
about.value_2_description: We ensure specialized care is available to families across all provinces.
about.value_3_description: We understand the challenges families face and provide empathetic, personalized care.
about.value_4_description: We use modern technology to improve access to specialized support.
